mapper.update: /*code.groupDelete*/ UPDATE lab_code_group SET IS_DELETE = 'Y' ,UPDATE_USER_ID = '' ,UPDATE_DATE = sysdate() WHERE GROUP_CODE = #{groupCode}
mapper.select: /*code.itemList*/ SELECT GROUP_CODE AS groupCode ,ITEM_CODE AS itemCode ,ITEM_NAME AS itemName ,DESCRIPTION AS description ,ORDER_NO AS orderNo ,IS_DELETE AS isDelete ,REG_USER_ID AS regUserId ,DATE_FORMAT(REG_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') as regDate ,UPDATE_USER_ID AS modUserId ,DATE_FORMAT(UPDATE_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') as modDate FROM lab_code_item WHERE GROUP_CODE = #{groupCode} AND IS_DELETE = 'N' ORDER BY ORDER_NO ASC
